name: Bathroom 5
description: Realistic 3d model bathroom 5 ______________________________ GENERAL: - created with 3ds Max 2014 - Model prepared for V-Ray 3.40 - Includes high-resolution textures - Includes Format OBJ (not smoothed) - All objects, textures and materials have their own names - Model is built to real-world scale - Units used: mm - Scene objects are organized by groups - No third-party renderer or plug-ins - Do not have missing DLL - Do not have default names - Geometry layer - Bathroom_5 ______________________________ GEOMETRY: - Polys: 1 134 454 - Verts: 1 138 770 ______________________________ FORMATS: - MAX (211 mb) - OBJ (69.7 mb) ______________________________ If you use V-Ray 3.0 and less, be careful, in materials in the chapter BRDF stands Microfaset GTR (GGX), If you yse V-Ray 3.1 and more, the field will be empty. Select Blinn, Phong or Ward - what you are prefer. Check out our other models Show more
